description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. A strategy RPG game similar to FF and magic mashed together, but much more intense and very fast paced. You must summon creatures to defend your realm from your opponent. There are 4 realms (forest, water, dark and light). Use creature synergy to pump up your attack, magic or life.  Play against AI or a friend!
